title: Professor's Slut
description: Anna has always crushed on her sexy English teacher, Professor Fox, with his orange hair and sexy Irish accent, but she never thought she'd get up the nerve to tell him so.When Professor Fox asks Anna to be his research assistant while he works on his next book, Anna is thrilled: extra time with the professor  and  extra cash? Sounds perfect! But things are even better than they first seemed when the professor bends Anna over his desk to show her his gratitude!At 3000 words, this erotic short includes hot domination, a sexy Irish professor, and rough sex!
author: Zara Slade
